title: Keep Your Pets Warm
description: Provide cozy bedding and warm blankets for your pets during cold nights.

title: Limit Outdoor Time
description: Avoid long outdoor walks when the temperature is very low to prevent hypothermia.

title: Check Paws Regularly
description: Snow and ice can harm your pet’s paws; wipe and inspect them after walks.

title: Hydration is Key
description: Even in winter, pets need fresh water to stay hydrated and healthy.

title: Provide Proper Nutrition
description: Consider slightly higher calorie diets for active pets to maintain body heat.

title: Groom Regularly
description: Keep fur clean and untangled; it helps with insulation and warmth.
